body: Can you provide an hprof or sample app that reproduces this issue?

@jrodbx I also just hit this:


issue.title: Ignore computeIgnoredBitmapRetainedSize on O preview

repository.name: leakcanary
repository.description: A memory leak detection library for Android.

issue.body:
In O preview heap dumps, android.graphics.Bitmap no longer has a field
named mBuffer.  In certain cases when a Bitmap was part of a leak trace,
mBuffer was used to update the leaking instance's total retained size.

This commit is a workaround until sources for Android O are published.

Fixes #759

body:
This method seems to still exist in the O preview and return a value that makes sense:
http://androidxref.com/7.1.1_r6/xref/frameworks/base/graphics/java/android/graphics/Bitmap.java#1275
